summary.span: Zawiera klasy, które obsługują współdziałanie kontrolki Windows Forms i WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Przestrzeń nazw zawiera klasy, które umożliwiają współdziałanie [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologii.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Kiedy używasz klas, które możesz hostować [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] formantów na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] stron, i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementów w [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]— aplikacje oparte na.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Są dwa klucza klasy, które implementują funkcje współdziałanie i .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . Klasy, których używasz, zależy od implementacji sterowania:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Użyj klasy, gdy należy użyć [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] kontrolować na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] strony.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Użyj klasy, gdy należy użyć [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementu w [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]— na podstawie aplikacji.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
